name: Summer Rainbow Frozen Foods Maker!
description:
The Summer Food Fair finally comes! This is the annual food fest for the whole city! Each year at this time countless super chefs will come here to sell their best yummy foods at the Summer Food Fair!
Rainbow frozen foods are the theme of this Summer Food Fair! We can find lots of trendy rainbow foods here! Such as rainbow popsicle, rainbow ice cream, and the most popular rainbow snow cone!
I've waited this food fest sooooo long! You also want to try these amazing rainbow frozen foods? Ok! Just come with me! Let's get start right now!

Product Features:
-A super fun food-making game
-Make yummy rainbow frozen foods
-Three kinds of rainbow frozen foods to make: rainbow popsicle, rainbow ice cream, and rainbow snow cone
-Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: popsicle molds, knife, cutting board, popsicle sticks, freezer, induction cooker, flour sieve, spatula, food mixer, waffle cone maker, ice cream cone roller, ice cream mold, ice cubes molds, ice crushers, snow cone cups, ice shaver, juice dispenser and so much more
-Tons of food materials and decorations to try: fruits, juice, edible flowers, gummy candies, chocolate, sugar, eggs, flour, water, butter, salt, milk, butter, sprinkles, seasoning, ice and so much more

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Take different courses for rainbow popsicle, rainbow ice cream, and rainbow snow cone
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies and fruits

Important Message for Purchases:
- You may restrict in-app purchases by disabling them on your device.
- By downloading this App you agree to SHAKE IT’s Privacy Policy at https://www.shakeitmediainc.com/privacy-policy/
- Please consider that this App may include third parties services for limited legally permissible purposes.
